hey, i downloaded everything, but in the instructions it says "3. Run VIPRE, and click on Help and Registration." When i run Vipre, i cant find anything that says help and registration... Help pleaseeee?!!! :(

@icedcurry 
You can update through VIPRE rightaway, but you've got to update throught VIPRE's system tray menu, 
or throught one of the menus on top of VIPRE. 

The update option from VIPRE's main screen is meant to update VIPRE if the updates are already downloaded 
straight from the site and stored on your pc. 



@drummer94 
On top of VIPRE there's a Help menu. Click on Help and choose Registration.

@TheArfen 

Yes, you can use auto-update. Also read this:

You can update through VIPRE rightaway (auto or manual), but you've got to update throught VIPRE's system tray menu, 
or throught one of the menus on top of VIPRE. 

The update option from VIPRE's main screen is meant to update VIPRE if the updates are already downloaded 
straight from the site and stored on your pc.
Just ignore my double posting, since the first post was meant for both icedcurry and TheArfen.
